objects.text:
• 4K Ultra HD Resolution
• 34W Dolby Audio System
• Fire OS with Alexa Built-in
EXCLUSIVE ONLINE OFFER • WHILE STOCKS LAST

product_details.name: Xiaomi 138 cm (55 inch) FX Pro QLED Ultra HD 4K Smart Fire TV L55MB-FPIN
product_details.description:
- Brand: Xiaomi.
- Model: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Name: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Year: 2025.
- Product Dimensions: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 cm; 9.1 kg.
- Memory Storage Capacity: 32 GB.
- Ram Memory Installed Size: 2 GB.
- Operating System: Fire OS 8.
- Graphics Coprocessor: Mali-G52 MC1.
- Response Time: 6.5 Milliseconds.
- Resolution: 3840x2160 Pixels.
- Special Features: Built-In Speaker, Chromecast, Bezel-Less Design, Wide Viewing Angle, Eye Comfort Mode.
- Mounting Hardware: Stand, User Manual, Warranty Card, Remote Control, Power Cable.
- Number of items: 7.
- Remote Control Description: One Click Prime, Netflix, Youtube | Alexa Voice Assistant.
- Remote control technology: Bluetooth.
- Display Technology: QLED.
- Standing screen display size: 55 Inches.
- Display Type: HDR 10+.
- Viewing Angle: 178 Degrees.
- Image Aspect Ratio: 16:09.
- Audio input compatible with the item: Earphone Out.
- Audio output mode: Surround.
- Supported audio formats: Dolby/DTS/MP3/FLAC/AAC/OGG/ADPCM/OPUS.
- Speaker Surround Sound Channel Configuration: Dolby Audio.
- Speakers Maximum Output Power: 34 Watts.
- Audio Wattage: 34 Watts.
- Voltage: 130 Volts.
- Power Source: AC.
- Batteries Included: Yes.
- Batteries Required: Yes.
- Battery cell composition: Alkaline.
- Refresh Rate: 60 Hz.
- Total USB ports: 2.
- Connector Type: Wi-Fi, USB, Ethernet, HDMI.
- Mounting Type: Wall Mount & Table Mount.
- Actual viewing angle: 178 Degrees.
- Includes Rechargeable Battery: No.
- Includes remote: Yes.
- Supports Bluetooth Technology: Yes.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Item Weight: 9 kg 100 g.
- Importer: TTE Electronics India Private Limited, Vikruthamala Village, Papanaidupeta Post, Yerpedu Mandal, Tirupati, Vikruthamala Village, Chitt oor, Andhra Pradesh, 5179.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 Piece.
- Generic Name: Television.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a tech-themed aesthetic with a modern, high-impact layout split into two sections. The left side of the banner presents product information using sharp, futuristic fonts with emphasis on the brand identity (`brand`) and main title (`heading`). The call-to-action is prominently displayed on a bright button (`cta_background` with `cta` text), encouraging immediate engagement. Supporting marketing elements include a bold tagline (`tagline`), urgency message (`subheading`), concise feature list (`description`), and pricing (`price`). On the right, a clear product image (`product_image`) stands out, enhancing visual engagement. Decorative abstract curves and dotted accents add depth and motion.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy Blue (#0D1128, #1D2951)
- Deep Charcoal (#050A1A)
- Bright Orange (#FF5500)
- Soft Amber (#FF8800)
- Electric Blue (#1E90FF)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image uses a rich, vibrant color palette dominated by deep oranges (#F26B1D), rich purples (#7A3E9D), and electric blues (#00B2EB), capturing attention and showcasing the QLED display’s high color accuracy. These hues are smoothly blended, transitioning seamlessly across the flower petals, while being highlighted through contrast and light reflection, creating a high dynamic range effect. The use of white (#FFFFFF) for text ensures clarity and readability over the vivid background. Black (#000000) is used for controls and branding, reinforcing product elegance. A fitting advertisement banner would reflect these bold, high-contrast colors to project vibrancy, premium quality, and innovation.
